definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

sentences.english: Suitable for fastening all kinds of hook and placard .
sentences.chinese: 适用于各种挂勾，海报看报的粘合固定。

sentences.english: The US presence is just a recruiting poster for the Taliban.
sentences.chinese: 美国的存在也就不过是张塔利班招募新兵的海报罢了。

sentences.english: Playbill output file, so long as plan dinking die outer edge line then.
sentences.chinese: 海报输出档案，只要绘制裁切外框线即可。

sentences.english: And your name, Schwarzenegger, it will never fit on a movie poster.
sentences.chinese: 还有你的名字，施瓦辛格，根本不适合上电影海报。

sentences.english: Old movie posters hung on the walls of Cal’s apartment.
sentences.chinese: 卡尔公寓的墙上张贴着老电影海报。

sentences.english: I masturbated for around 20 minutes before ejaculating over the poster.
sentences.chinese: 我对着他的海报打了20分钟的飞机。

sentences.english: Ralph, Jr. unrolls a poster of the Marines and tacks it on the wall of his room.
sentences.chinese: 小拉尔夫打开一张舰队海报贴在自己卧室的墙上。

sentences.english: Young girls in front of movie posters.
sentences.chinese: 站在电影海报前的小女孩。

sentences.english: He sticked provocative poster on board when nobody was looking.
sentences.chinese: 趁无人注意，他在板上贴了具有煽动性的海报。

sentences.english: The poster design is concerned, compared to other design professional is more typical.
sentences.chinese: 对于海报设计而言，较之于其它设计专业更具典型性。

sentences.english: Some Right-wing commentators have seized approvingly on the image.
sentences.chinese: 一些右翼评论家称赞这张海报。

sentences.english: Posters promoting China's one-child policy can be seen all over China.
sentences.chinese: 中国推进一胎化政策的海报四处可见。

sentences.english: You can check out the poster on the bulletin board at school.
sentences.chinese: 你可以去咱们学校的海报栏看看。

sentences.english: What affects the price of a movie poster?
sentences.chinese: 哪些因素会影响电影海报的价值？

sentences.english: Tex nailed posters onto the board.
sentences.chinese: 特克斯把海报钉在墙上。

sentences.english: The reference to Little Red Riding Hood in the clutches of sharp teeth makes this poster jump off the page.
sentences.chinese: 提及小红帽在离合器的锐利的牙齿使这一海报跳下页。

definition: photo taken during a theatrical production/a still (from a movie)
painted eggshell/Easter egg/(media) Easter egg (hidden feature in software or a movie etc)/post-credits scene
head-and-shoulders photo (esp. a formal one used in a passport, ID card etc)
